comment: Main text block containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, including large seal script characters (e.g., 青, 靜, 井) with smaller annotations (e.g., 古文, 切, 仓经). The text is arranged in a traditional right-to-left format, typical of classical Chinese dictionaries or texts like the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The outer border is thick and black, possibly indicating a printed page from an old book. There are also marginal notes on the right edge (e.g., 小二〇八, 言部, 繆春), suggesting classification or pagination details.
